nodes.title: Research complete: 16+ alternatives evaluated, report at docs/toxicity-alternatives-report.md
Choose Perspective API replacement strategy
nodes.metadata_json: {"branch":"main","confidence":80,"prompt":"Bryan asked to research alternative toxicity scoring APIs since Perspective API sunsets Dec 31, 2026. Research covered 6 specified tools plus 10+ additional alternatives. Now need to decide: (1) primary scorer model, (2) Rust integration approach, (3) fallback strategy, (4) timeline. Chainlink issue #13."}

nodes.title: Primary: unbiased-toxic-roberta via ort crate, backup: OpenAI Moderation API, complement: CoPE for edge cases
Primary: MiniLMv2-toxic-jigsaw-onnx (22M params, lightest weight) via ort crate
Primary: OpenAI Moderation API (cloud-only, no local inference)
Perspective API 1 QPS rate limit blocks pipeline scaling; local ONNX scorer eliminates rate limits entirely
Replace Perspective API with local ONNX toxicity scorer
nodes.metadata_json:
{"branch":"main","confidence":90,"prompt":"Implement the following plan:

# Plan: Replace Perspective API with Local ONNX Toxicity Scorer

Charcoal's toxicity scorer currently uses Google's Perspective API, which sunsets Dec 31, 2026, has a 1 QPS rate limit that blocks pipeline scaling (issue #10), and requires network access for every scored post. The research (issue #11) recommends Detoxify's unbiased-toxic-roberta model via ONNX Runtime. This model runs locally on CPU, has no rate limits, returns the same 0-1 continuous scores across 7 categories, and was specifically trained to reduce bias around identity mentions.

The existing ToxicityScorer trait was designed for exactly this swap — we implement a new struct behind the same trait and wire it in."}

nodes.title: Choose concurrency approach for follower scoring
buffer_unordered streams — borrows refs, no Arc/spawn needed
tokio::spawn with Arc wrappers — requires 'static, more complex
r2d2 connection pool with spawn — adds dep, threads DB
Chose buffer_unordered — simplest approach, borrows refs, no new deps beyond futures
Implemented parallel scan pipeline with buffer_unordered and --concurrency flag
Parallel pipeline working: 1260+ accounts scored across 37 amplifiers in live test, 31 tests pass, clippy clean
Created README.md and cleaned up CLAUDE.md — updated external services, added project status, moved Deciduous workflow to docs/
Updated comments referencing Perspective as primary scorer to reflect ONNX default
Score quote text in amplification events
How to handle reposts vs quotes for scoring
Fetch and score quote text, display with toxicity — reposts stay neutral (no text to score)
Leave as-is — both event types trigger same follower analysis
Use quote toxicity as multiplier on follower threat scores
Added fetch_post_text() and quote text scoring in amplification pipeline
Quote text now fetched via getPosts, scored for toxicity, stored in DB, displayed in scan output. 31 tests pass, clippy clean.

Sentence embeddings for semantic topic overlap
nodes.metadata_json: {"branch":"feat/sentence-embeddings","commit":"9ea738a","confidence":85,"files":["src/topics/overlap.rs","src/scoring/profile.rs"],"prompt":"yes, go ahead - if there are any additional issues you need to create, or more planning needed, please do that, but if you think you have enough to move forward, make sure we've got deciduous nodes ready, and start working"}

nodes.title: Add all-MiniLM-L6-v2 download to model download infrastructure
Sentence embedding infrastructure complete: SentenceEmbedder, model download, DB migration, full pipeline wiring
End-to-end test of sentence embeddings on fresh database
Fresh scan revealed scoring too aggressive: 12 High, 160 Elevated out of 213 accounts. Embedding overlaps 0.45-0.85 vs TF-IDF 0.05-0.24. Additive formula lets overlap alone drive scores to Elevated+.
Switch from additive to multiplicative scoring formula
nodes.metadata_json: {"branch":"feat/sentence-embeddings","commit":"c2201eb","files":["src/scoring/threat.rs","src/db/models.rs"],"prompt":"Problem: additive formula (tox*70 + overlap*30) lets overlap alone produce Elevated+ scores with embeddings. Alternatives considered: (1) raise thresholds only — rejected, would mask the root cause; (2) reduce overlap_weight — rejected, still additive and overlap still independent; (3) multiplicative formula where overlap amplifies toxicity — chosen. New formula: tox*70*(1+overlap*1.5). Zero toxicity = zero score regardless of overlap. Also raised High threshold 25→35, gate threshold 0.05→0.15 for embedding scale."}

nodes.title: Implement multiplicative scoring formula and update all tests

Alternative: smallest model, fastest inference, but less bias mitigation
Alternative: simplest integration but reintroduces API dependency
